settings.html:
<style>
fw-embed-feed{
--thumbnail-border-radius: 10px;
--thumbnail-font-size:20px;
--fw-thumbnail-aspect-ratio: 16/9;
--thumbnail-gap: 10px;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1386px) {
fw-embed-feed{
--fw-thumbnail-height: calc((25vw - 80px) / 9 * 16);
}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 700px) {
fw-embed-feed{
--thumbnail-gap: 20px;
--fw-thumbnail-height: calc((25vw - 48px) / 9 * 16);
--fw-thumbnail-width:calc(25% - 15px);
}
}
</style>

<fw-embed-feed channel="cheerble" playlist="oe33Rn" mode="row" open_in="default" max_videos="4" placement="middle" player_placement="bottom-right"></fw-embed-feed>
<script type="text/javascript" src="//asset.fwcdn3.com/js/embed-feed.js"></script>

<script>
 document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    document.querySelectorAll("fw-embed-feed").forEach(item => {

const styleElement = document.createElement('style');
  styleElement.textContent = `
.fwn-i55vzc{
max-height: 650px;
}
    @media screen and (max-width: 699px) {
       .fwn-1vvu3hk.e1nuer044{
      padding: 0px 0px;
    }
.fwn-1uklz8p{
padding-left: 15px;
}
     }
    .fwn-1uklz8p{
    border-radius: 0px; 
    }
.fwn-10jvgrw {
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
}
    .fwn-7g7od2,.fwn-7g7od2:hover{
      background-image: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0037/5209/9958/files/slider_arrow_left.png');
    }
    .fwn-jhredc,.fwn-jhredc:hover{
      background-image: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0037/5209/9958/files/slider_arrow_right.png'); 
    }
  `;
const checkShadowRoot = setInterval(() => {
  if (item.shadowRoot) {
   
item.shadowRoot.appendChild(styleElement)
    clearInterval(checkShadowRoot);
  }
}, 100); 
});
  })
</script>

settings.heading: 3 Interactive Modes
settings.content: Switch between modes to keep your dog entertained, from gentle play to high-energy fun.

settings.heading: E-TPU Material
settings.content: The E-TPU outer shell is chew-proof and FDA certified, making this the ultimate long-lasting, eco-friendly smart ball for dogs.

settings.heading: Replaceable Shell
settings.content: Keep your smart ball for dogs clean and play-ready by simply wiping it down and rinsing the outer shell.

settings.heading: Super Lightweight
settings.content: At just 130 grams, this smart pet toy is as feather-light as it is heavy duty.

settings.title: Wicked Ball Air: Bounce into Smart Play

settings.title: Wicked Ball Air Shell
settings.content: 3 interactive modes for endless fun. Shop Now

settings.title: Wicked Ball Air Rope Replacement Set
settings.content: Enjoy both independent play and interactive bonding moments. Shop Now

settings.title: Wicked Rugby Shell
settings.content: Squeaky football fun, to fetch and chase. Shop Now

settings.heading: Play-Rest Balance
settings.description: This interactive dog toy takes a 30-minute nap after 10 minutes of play to recharge, ensuring balanced playtime for your pup.

settings.heading: Easy to Clean
settings.description: Keep your smart ball for dogs clean and play-ready by simply wiping it down and rinsing the outer shell (make sure it's screwed tight, though!)

settings.heading: USB Type-C Charging
settings.description: Enjoy up to 3.5 hours of playtime on a single charge. Recharge it quickly with the included Type-C cable in just 50 minutes.

settings.heading: Replaceable Outer Shell
settings.description: Sustain your pet's playtime with interchangeable outer covers that extend toy longevity while reducing waste.

settings.title: Top Picks for Happy Pets
settings.content: Discover products designed with your pet’s health and happiness in mind. Compare and contrast – you’ll know what’s best for them!

settings.description: Use this text to share information about your collection with your customers.
1. Twist counterclockwise to open the outer shell.
2. Press and hold the power button for 3 seconds to turn on. Short-press to switch modes.
3. Align the core with the slot and pop it in.
4. Screw the outer shell back on, clockwise.

5. Activate your Wicked Ball Air by:
- Tapping it lightly OR Gently shaking it

6. Activate your Wicked Ball Air by:
- Wait 5 seconds before playtime begins!

settings.title: Do you ship globally?
settings.content: Yes, we ship to most countries in the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.content: All products purchased from our website may be returned or replaced within 30 days of purchase for a full refund less shipping costs, no questions asked. International return orders may be subject to return shipping fees. To initiate such a return please contact us.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.content: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Where can I download the user manual?
settings.content:
Write content to answer to common questions your customers may have about your products, shipping policies..

{{ product.metafields.custom.user_manual | metafield_tag }}

settings.title: Any other questions?
settings.content: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.accordion_content: Please read our FAQs page to find out more.
settings.contact_us_content: Contact our customer support. Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 9.30am-6:30pm HKT. Average answer time: 24h
